item.description:
Hello,

Please join us this Saturday @ 2pm to play some flag-football. Want to get outside and enjoy the weather? Come play flag football. Our goal is to have fun. All skill levels are welcome. We have a diverse group of people that come every week, and its a great way to meet new people. The field is across the Alewife-Brook Pkwy from the Alewife Redline 'T' stop. Just follow the signs for Rindge Ave if taking the 'T'.

We hope you can make it.
item.name: WEEKEND FLAG FOOTBALL - SAT 2PM - RUSSELL FIELD
